name: market for building operation, luxury hotel | building operation, luxury hotel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21669/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'building operation, luxury hotel', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'building operation, luxury hotel',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  building operation, luxury hotel', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
